questions.question_text: Which of the following variable names are illegal and will cause the SyntaxError exception? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: CD
C/D: Tested in Pycharm, 'for' and 'in' are illegal variable names

Selected Answer: CD
The illegal variable names that will cause a SyntaxError are:

C. for
D. in

Selected Answer: AC
print and for
